00003 using System;
00004 using System.Runtime.InteropServices;

00006 namespace nsClearConsole
00007 {
00008         public class ClearConsole
00009         {
00010                 private const int STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE  = -11;
00011                 private const byte EMPTY = 32;
00012 
00013                 [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]
00014                         struct COORD
00015                 {
00016                         public short x;
00017                         public short y;
00018                 }
00019 
00020                 [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]
00021                         struct SMALL_RECT
00022                 {
00023                         public short Left;
00024                         public short Top;
00025                         public short Right;
00026                         public short Bottom;
00027                 }
00028 
00029                 [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]
00030                         struct  CONSOLE_SCREEN_BUFFER_INFO
00031                 {
00032                         public COORD dwSize;
00033                         public COORD dwCursorPosition;
00034                         public int wAttributes;
00035                         public SMALL_RECT srWindow;
00036                         public COORD dwMaximumWindowSize;
00037                 }
00038 
00039                 [DllImport("kernel32.dll", EntryPoint="GetStdHandle", SetLastError=true, CharSet=CharSet.Auto, CallingConvention=CallingConvention.StdCall)]
00040                 private static extern int GetStdHandle(int nStdHandle);
00041 
00042                 [DllImport("kernel32.dll", EntryPoint="FillConsoleOutputCharacter", SetLastError=true, CharSet=CharSet.Auto, CallingConvention=CallingConvention.StdCall)]
00043                 private static extern int FillConsoleOutputCharacter(int hConsoleOutput, byte cCharacter, int nLength, COORD dwWriteCoord, ref int lpNumberOfCharsWritten);
00044 
00045                 [DllImport("kernel32.dll", EntryPoint="GetConsoleScreenBufferInfo", SetLastError=true, CharSet=CharSet.Auto, CallingConvention=CallingConvention.StdCall)]
00046                 private static extern int GetConsoleScreenBufferInfo(int hConsoleOutput, ref CONSOLE_SCREEN_BUFFER_INFO lpConsoleScreenBufferInfo);
00047 
00048                 [DllImport("kernel32.dll", EntryPoint="SetConsoleCursorPosition", SetLastError=true, CharSet=CharSet.Auto, CallingConvention=CallingConvention.StdCall)]
00049                 private static extern int SetConsoleCursorPosition(int hConsoleOutput, COORD dwCursorPosition);
00050 
00051                 private int hConsoleHandle;
00052 
00053                 public ClearConsole()
00054                 {
00055                         //
00056                         // TODO: Add constructor logic here.
00057                         //
00058                         hConsoleHandle = GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE);
00059                 }
00060 
00061                 public void Clear()
00062                 {
00063                         int hWrittenChars = 0;
00064                         CONSOLE_SCREEN_BUFFER_INFO strConsoleInfo = new CONSOLE_SCREEN_BUFFER_INFO();
00065                         COORD Home;
00066                         Home.x = Home.y = 0;
00067                         GetConsoleScreenBufferInfo(hConsoleHandle, ref strConsoleInfo);
00068                         FillConsoleOutputCharacter(hConsoleHandle, EMPTY, strConsoleInfo.dwSize.x * strConsoleInfo.dwSize.y, Home, ref hWrittenChars);
00069                         SetConsoleCursorPosition(hConsoleHandle, Home);
00070                 }
00071         }
00072 }
